venues.name: Russian Vapor Baths
venues.review: A neighborhood Russian banya on Division Street that's been sweating Chicagoans since 1914. The schvitz room, oak-leaf platza, and cold pool are the entire experience — no upgrades, no wellness branding, no apologies. The most authentic bathhouse between New York and Los Angeles.

venues.name: Chuan Spa at The Langham
venues.review: The best hotel spa in Chicago by a comfortable margin. Traditional Chinese wellness philosophy applied with modern precision — the contrast pools and heated stone loungers in the thermal suite are reason enough to come. The Langham just does things properly.

venues.name: Den Wellness
venues.review: Chicago's cleanest answer to the sauna-and-cold-plunge trend. Infrared and traditional Finnish sauna, ice plunge, and a social lounge designed around community rather than isolation. Sessions book fast — plan ahead.
